explanation: [0-0] A little boy in brown clothes is standing sideways on the floor of a shopping mall, his left leg in front and his right leg back, with his right leg raised backward. He is wearing black and white sneakers and looking to the right. The mall floor is made of smooth tiles. In the background, some shops and a large blue billboard can be seen, and there are some people moving around in the mall.

[0-4] Then the boy runs quickly to the right. As he runs to the right, the surrounding scenery moves to the left. Subsequently, the boy runs to a silver metal shopping cart next to which stands a young man in black. The man's right hand is holding the shopping cart handle, and his left hand is on the railing of the cart. Then he lifts the rear railing of the cart with his left hand, and the little boy crawls into the shopping cart through the opening. Then he gets up and stands in the cart, holding the railing of the cart with both hands. In the distance, two women in white down jackets can be seen standing in front of the counter.
